params.select: SELECT TOP 31 waybillNumber, isNull(convert(CHAR(12),departureDate,104), '--.--.----') + ' * No : ' + CAST(formNumber AS CHAR(12)) waybillText FROM waybills WHERE garageNumber = 0{_garnom} AND waybillState NOT IN(2) AND ( DATEDIFF(dd, departureDate, GETDATE()) < 31 OR DATEDIFF(dd, returnDate, GETDATE()) < 31 ) ORDER BY departureDate DESC

column.name: sheetNumber
column.caption: ведомость No
column.select: SELECT s.sheetNumber, f.fuelName FROM waybillsRefuellingSheets s INNER JOIN fuel f ON s.fuelId = f.fuelId WHERE s.sheetNumber = (SELECT sheetNumber FROM waybillsRefuelling WHERE recordId={_recordId} )

column.name: driverId
column.caption: водитель
column.select: SELECT 0 rorder, 0 driverId, '-- выберите водителя --' driverName UNION SELECT 1 rorder, w.driverId, '*' + d.string driverName FROM waybillsDrivers w LEFT JOIN drivers d ON d.driverId = w.driverId WHERE w.garageNumber = 0{_garnom} AND w.waybillNumber = 0{_waybill} AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM waybillsDriversResponse r WHERE r.garageNumber = w.garageNumber AND r.waybillNumber = w.waybillNumber AND r.driverId = w.driverId ) UNION ALL SELECT 2 rorder, w.driverId, d.string driverName FROM waybillsDrivers w LEFT JOIN drivers d ON d.driverId = w.driverId WHERE w.garageNumber = 0{_garnom} AND w.waybillNumber = 0{_waybill} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM waybillsDriversResponse r WHERE r.garageNumber = w.garageNumber AND r.waybillNumber = w.waybillNumber AND r.driverId = w.driverId ) ORDER BY rorder, driverName

provider.selectSQL: SELECT facility = (SELECT model+' '+registrationNumber FROM transportFacilities WHERE garageNumber = {_garnom} and ownerId = dbo.getCurrentOwner()), groupAccName = (SELECT groupAccName FROM transportFacilities t, groupAcc g WHERE garageNumber = {_garnom} AND g.groupAccId = t.groupAccId and ownerId = dbo.getCurrentOwner()), refuellingDate = dbo.getParameterByName('REFUELLING_DATE'), driverId = (SELECT isNull(driverId, 0) FROM waybillsDriversResponse WHERE garageNumber = {_garnom} AND waybillNumber = {_waybill} and ownerId = dbo.getCurrentOwner()), sheetNumber = (SELECT sheetNumber FROM waybillsRefuelling WHERE recordId={_recordId} ), quantity = 0
